name: @kevinoid/project-template
description: A Node.js/npm project template with codecov, coveralls, ESLint, github_changelog_generator, istanbul, JSDoc, and mocha.
author: Kevin Locke <kevin@kevinlocke.name>
//: All scripts should run in POSIX sh and Windows cmd.exe

scripts.lint: npm run lint-js && npm run lint-doc
scripts.postversion: git push --follow-tags origin master && echo Remember to update GitHub Releases from CHANGELOG.md && echo until skywinder/github-changelog-generator#56 is fixed.
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-unit
scripts.test-cov: npm run lint && npm run test-unit-cov
scripts.version-deps: npm install david depcheck git-branch-is travis-status
